src:
Konte uporedio sadašnju ekipu Intera sa „njegovim“ Juventusom!
01 Nov 2019, 16:59 by Kopi
Antonio Konte je letos preuzeo trenersku funkciju u Interu, na veliko iznenađenje navijača Juventusa koji su ga smatrali klupskom legendom.
Govoreći na konferenciji za novinare uoči sutrašnje utakmice Intera protiv Bolonje, bivši selektor Italije uporedio je sličnosti između svog trenutnog tima i Juventusove ekipe iz sezone 2011/12.
– Moj Juventus nije bio u Evropi te godine. Upravo zbog toga ne možete upoređivati situaciju. Jedina sličnost je da obe ekipe moraju da igraju brzinom od 1000 km/h. Ako sklonimo nogu sa papučice, ne pobeđujemo. Ni ona ekipa Juventusa, ni ova Intera, nije stvorena za čekanje.
Upitan o potencijalnoj ponudi Intera za vezistu Mančester Junajteda Nemanju Matića, Konte je odbio da komentariše bilo kakve spekulacije.
– Ne govorim o igračima drugih klubova, iz poštovanja prema svojim igračima. Imam veliku naklonost prema onima koji su mi pomogli da osvojim važne stvari, ali tu završavam.
Konte je sarađivao sa Matićem u Čelsiju tokom kampanje 16/17, zajedno su osvojili Premijer ligu.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Conte compared Inter's current team to "his" Juventus!
01 Nov 2019, 15:59 by Kopi
Antonio Konte took over as coach at Inter this summer, much to the surprise of Juventus fans who regarded him as a club legend.
Speaking at a news conference ahead of tomorrow's Inter Milan match against Bologna, the former Italy coach has compared the similarities between his current team and the Juventus squad from the 2011/12 season.
- My Juventus was not in Europe that year. This is why you cannot compare the situation. The only similarity is that both teams have to play at 1000 km / h. If we take our foot off the pedal, we don't win. Neither that Juventus team, nor this Inter, was made for waiting.
Asked about Inter Milan's potential bid for Manchester United midfielder Nemanja Matic, Conte declined to comment on any speculation.
- I'm not talking about players in other clubs, out of respect for my players. I have a lot of affection for those who helped me win important things, but that's where I end up.
Conte worked with Matic in Chelsea during the 16/17 campaign, and together they won the Premier League.
